label: cascading_failure_01_dx_auth_audit_021
content:

### Deployments & Changes
- Updated RBAC policy documentation to include new ticket-ID enforcement; stored signed change control approval.

### Events
- Closed 1 of 4 missing-ticket exceptions after owner supplied change record; remaining tracked with due dates.
- Investigated 19 SAML assertion errors; identified one app sending incorrect Audience; app owner scheduled fix.
- Verified helpdesk median response improved after adding canned responses for common MFA reset cases.

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: Shift: I. Petrova. 1 page. 11 tickets. Status: Stable; exceptions partially resolved and partner app issue tracked.
